title: Bill Cash – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Bill Cash, the Conservative MP for Stone, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I’m backing Boris Johnson and call on others to do so now. Action this day!
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
